>
[North Wind's Night Verse](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1068)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 187 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Katana](/Weapons.aspx?ID=55)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) [katana](/Weapons.aspx?ID=55)_ is always cool to the touch, nearly uncomfortably so. Unadorned and with no tsuba, its honed blade is carved from a single tusk of [dragon-turtle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=157) ivory and wrapped in strips of [winter wolf](/Monsters.aspx?ID=403) hide. Strikes with the katana gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls against creatures that have a status penalty to their Speed or are [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35). The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a _greater striking rune_ and +4 for _major striking_.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> command ([cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)) **Frequency** once per 1 minute; **Trigger** Your spell deals cold damage to a creature;  **Effect** Choose one creature dealt cold damage by the spell. It takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
